name: KlattAero, LLC
about: KlattAero, LLC, located at Waupaca Municipal Airport (KPCZ), is a premier aviation service provider dedicated to excellence in pilot training and aviation education. As an assisted-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO), we offer a range of services including annual recurrent training, biennial flight reviews, ground school, instrument proficiency checks, and introductory flights. Our no-fee after-hours policy ensures that our clients are never left unassisted. With a commitment to being leaders in the aviation industry, KlattAero provides a comprehensive and supportive environment for all your flight training needs. We are here to help you achieve your aviation goals with professionalism and integrity.
